title: JSON app: viewlet component schema
description: Defines the available viewlet components for the JSON framework

viewlet.description: The viewlet type, a view component

refId.description: A unique identifier, used to refer to the viewlet from the source code

width.description: The width of the view, determined by layout or with a fixed size

height.description: The height of the view, determined by layout or with a fixed size

minWidth.description: The minimum width of the view

maxWidth.description: The maximum width of the view

minHeight.description: The minimum height of the view

maxHeight.description: The maximum height of the view

weight.description: The weight of the view, used to evenly place items in the remaining space of a linear container

padding.description: A list of padding values in the order of left, top, right and bottom

paddingLeft.description: The left padding inside the view

paddingTop.description: The top padding inside the view

paddingRight.description: The right padding inside the view

paddingBottom.description: The bottom padding inside the view

margin.description: A list of margin values in the order of left, top, right and bottom

marginLeft.description: The left margin of the view

marginTop.description: The top margin of the view

marginRight.description: The right margin of the view

marginBottom.description: The bottom margin of the view

marginSpacing.description: The margin to the top or left of the view if it's not the first visible item in a linear container

gravity.description: The gravity is the alignment to position a view within its container

horizontalGravity.description: The gravity is the alignment to position a view within its container

verticalGravity.description: The gravity is the alignment to position a view within its container

visibility.description: Determines the visibility of the view

backgroundColor.description: The color behind the content of the view

recycling.description: Recycle or replace sub items on refresh

source.description: The source to retrieve the image from

stretchType.description: Determines how the image is stretched within its frame

source.description: The source to retrieve the image from

highlightedSource.description: An alternative image source for the highlighted state

disabledSource.description: An alternative image source for the disabled state

colorize.description: Colorize the image source with a single color

stretchType.description: Determines how the image is stretched within its frame

tapEvent.description: Sends event when the button is tapped

localizedText.description: The localized string key of the text

maxLines.description: The maximum amount of lines of the text, 0 = no limitation

textAlignment.description: The horizontal alignment of the text within its frame

items.description: A list of viewlets in a container component

levelWidth.description: The width of the level in pixel independent units

levelHeight.description: The height of the level in pixel independent units

sliceWidth.description: The thickness of a slice in pixel independent units

backgroundImage.description: The image to reveal behind the level canvas

requireClearRate.description: The clear rate required to complete the level

clearEvent.description: Sends event when the level is cleared

lethalHitEvent.description: Sends event when a lethal hit occurs in the level

lethalHitEvents.description: Sends multiple events when a lethal hit occurs in the level

fps.description: The amount of frames per second the sprite refresh loop tries to run on

drawPhysicsBoundaries.description: Debug setting: visualize physics boundaries generated by the sliced area

sprites.description: A list of sprites to place within the container

slices.description: A flattened list of slice vector coordinates

orientation.description: The layout direction of the items in the container

titleBar.description: The title bar view at the top of the screen

bottomBar.description: Takes up the space of the bottom navigation bar on Android or the bottom safe area on iOS

contentItems.description: A list of viewlets within the safe area

backgroundItem.description: A background view that's behind the content items and ignores the safe area

gridWidth.description: The width of the coordinate system for placing sprites, they are pixel independent

gridHeight.description: The height of the coordinate system for placing sprites, they are pixel independent

sliceWidth.description: The thickness of a slice in pixel independent units
